#QUESTION 3
quadratic_formula <- function(a,b,c) {
  
  if((b^2)-(4*a*c)>=0)
  {
    q_p_x <-((-1*b)+sqrt((b^2)-(4*a*c)))/(2*a)
    q_n_x <- ((-1*b)-sqrt((b^2)-(4*a*c)))/(2*a)
    quadratic <- c(q_p_x, q_n_x)
    quadratic
  }
}

quadratic_formula(2, -5, -3)
